content.description:
Magnum propiusque noscendum ut eruditissimoeruditus, -a, -um, adj.: well-educated viro 
visum. Iubet liburnicamliburnica, -ae, f.: fast-sailing warship aptariapto, -are = paro, -are; mihi si venire una vellem 
facit copiam; respondi studere me malle, et forte ipse quod 
scriberem dederat.
content.question: Where was Pliny the Elder stationed as an admiral during the eruption of Mt. Vesuvius?

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius

skill.text: 2.B: Describe historical and cultural contexts of Latin texts.
